errors.title: Access denied
errors.errorDescription: The resource owner or authorization server denied the request.

errors.title: OpenID scope required in access token
errors.errorDescription: Requests for ID tokens or access tokens with OpenID scopes require the 'openid' scope.

errors.title: Feature not enabled access denied
errors.errorDescription: The requested feature is not enabled in this environment.

errors.title: User not assigned
errors.errorDescription: User is not assigned to the client application.

errors.title: No scope allowed by policy
errors.errorDescription: Policy evaluation succeeded but all the requested scopes were rejected.

errors.title: No matching policy
errors.errorDescription: Policy evaluation failed for this request, please check the policy configurations.

errors.title: Scope denied
errors.errorDescription: Some of the requested scopes were denied by the policy. Denied scopes: [{0}].

errors.title: Refresh scopes denied
errors.errorDescription: Some of the scopes requested for the refresh request were not granted in the original authorize request. Denied scopes: {0}.

errors.title: Unsupported MFA attestation
errors.errorDescription: 'acr_values' not supported.

errors.title: MFA prompt required but not configured
errors.errorDescription: The authorize request required an MFA prompt but the org has no factors configured.

errors.title: MFA attestation policy denied
errors.errorDescription: The MFA attestation request was denied by policy.

errors.title: MFA attestation cannot enroll
errors.errorDescription: The MFA attestation request requires user enrollment but the app does not support inline enrollment.

errors.title: MFA attestation requires signed request object
errors.errorDescription: MFA attestation requests must be made using a signed request JWT.

errors.title: MFA attestation cannot use custom as
errors.errorDescription: MFA attestation requests cannot use a custom authorization server.

errors.title: MFA attestation login hint invalid
errors.errorDescription: 'login_hint' did not match a user assigned to the client app.

errors.title: Admin consent insufficient permission
errors.errorDescription: The user does not have sufficient permission to provide Administrator Consent.

errors.title: Invalid userinfo response
errors.errorDescription: The UserInfo response is invalid.

errors.title: Social transaction expired
errors.errorDescription: Social transaction expired.

errors.title: Failed username transform
errors.errorDescription: Unable to process the username transform.

errors.title: Failed username transform invalid expression
errors.errorDescription: Unable to process the username transform. Username Transform has an invalid expression: '{0}'.

errors.title: Failed username transform missed field
errors.errorDescription: Unable to process the username transform. A required property is missing. Missing field: '{0}'.

errors.title: Failed username transform whitespaces found
errors.errorDescription: Unable to process the username transform. Transformed username contained whitespaces: '{0}'.

errors.title: User match error
errors.errorDescription: Could not match social profile to an Okta user.

errors.title: User link error
errors.errorDescription: Error in linking or finding a linked user.

errors.title: Invalid user status error
errors.errorDescription: User status is invalid.

errors.title: Login failed
errors.errorDescription: Login failed.

errors.title: JIT disabled
errors.errorDescription: User creation was disabled.

errors.title: JIT denied
errors.errorDescription: User creation was denied by the callout service.

errors.title: Link disabled
errors.errorDescription: User linking was disabled.

errors.title: Link failure
errors.errorDescription: User linking failed.

errors.title: Link denied group
errors.errorDescription: User linking was denied because the user is not in any of the specified groups.

errors.title: Link denied callout
errors.errorDescription: User linking was denied by the callout service.

errors.title: Mismatched user in cache and session
errors.errorDescription: Invalid session.

errors.title: User canceled request
errors.errorDescription: User canceled the social login request.

errors.title: Invalid username
errors.errorDescription: Transformed username '{0}' is invalid.

errors.title: Client credentials self scope requested
errors.errorDescription: The 'client_credentials' grant type may not request .self scopes.

errors.title: Consent required
errors.errorDescription: The following scopes require user consent: [{0}].

errors.title: Consent required client credentials
errors.errorDescription: The following scopes require user consent and cannot be granted for the client credentials grant type: [{0}].

errors.title: Consent required ropf
errors.errorDescription: The following scopes require user consent: [{0}]. To access protected scopes using the resource owner password grant type, please uncheck 'Require consent' in the app settings or set the 'consent_method' to 'TRUSTED' through the apps API.

errors.title: No org scopes granted
errors.errorDescription: You are not allowed any of the requested scopes.

errors.title: ID token does not match session
errors.errorDescription: The ID token subject does not match the current session's user.

errors.title: IdP initiated flow disabled
errors.errorDescription: IdP-initiated login is disabled for this client.

errors.title: Insufficient scope
errors.errorDescription: Insufficient scope

errors.title: Access token insufficient scopes
errors.errorDescription: The access token provided does not contain the required scopes.

errors.title: Interaction required
errors.errorDescription: Your client is configured to use the interaction code flow and user interaction is required to complete the request.

errors.title: Invalid authorization details
errors.errorDescription: Invalid authorization_details.

errors.title: Invalid authorization details with errors
errors.errorDescription: Invalid authorization_details. Errors: [{0}].

errors.title: Invalid authorization details invalid type
errors.errorDescription: The type value {0} in authorization_details is not supported.

errors.title: Invalid client
errors.errorDescription: Client authentication failed. Either the client or the client credentials are invalid.

errors.title: Missing client credentials
errors.errorDescription: No client credentials found.

errors.title: Invalid basic auth credentials
errors.errorDescription: Found Authentication header but was not valid client credentials.

errors.title: Invalid client ID
errors.errorDescription: Invalid value for 'client_id' parameter.

errors.title: Invalid token endpoint auth method
errors.errorDescription: Client authentication failed. Either the client or the client credentials are invalid.

errors.title: Invalid client secret
errors.errorDescription: The client secret supplied for a confidential client is invalid.

errors.title: Unsupported auth method browser request
errors.errorDescription: Browser requests to the token endpoint must use Proof Key for Code Exchange.

errors.title: Unsupported auth method client creds
errors.errorDescription: Client Credentials requests to the Org Authorization Server must use the private_key_jwt token_endpoint_auth_method.

errors.title: Invalid application type client credentials
errors.errorDescription: Only clients with 'application_type' of 'service' may use the client_credentials 'grant_type' with the Org Authorization Server.

errors.title: Client assertion type invalid
errors.errorDescription: The client_assertion_type is invalid.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid issuer
errors.errorDescription: The issuer claim for client_assertion is not a valid client_id.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid subject
errors.errorDescription: The subject claim for client_assertion is not a valid client_id.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid no secret
errors.errorDescription: The issuer and subject claim for client_assertion is invalid because the client does not have a client secret.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid audience
errors.errorDescription: The audience claim for client_assertion must be the endpoint invoked for the request.

errors.title: Client assertion expiration required
errors.errorDescription: The client_assertion must contain the 'exp' claim as seconds since epoch.

errors.title: Client assertion expired token
errors.errorDescription: The client_assertion token is expired.

errors.title: Client assertion expires too far in future
errors.errorDescription: The client_assertion token has an expiration too far into the future.

errors.title: Client assertion issued at in future
errors.errorDescription: The client_assertion token must be issued before the current time.

errors.title: Client assertion already used
errors.errorDescription: The client_assertion token has already been used.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid signature
errors.errorDescription: The client_assertion signature is invalid.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid JWT
errors.errorDescription: The parsing of the client_assertion failed.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid kid
errors.errorDescription: The client_assertion JWT kid is invalid.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid jwks
errors.errorDescription: The client JWKSet is invalid.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid signature algorithm
errors.errorDescription: The client_assertion JWT signature algorithm is invalid.

errors.title: Client assertion invalid secret length
errors.errorDescription: The client secret is too short to verify a JWT HMAC.

errors.title: Authorize request object invalid issuer
errors.errorDescription: The issuer of the authorize request object is invalid.

errors.title: Invalid client metadata
errors.errorDescription: Invalid request

errors.title: Invalid grant
errors.errorDescription: Invalid grant

errors.title: PKCE verification failed
errors.errorDescription: PKCE verification failed.

errors.title: PKCE verification failed with reason
errors.errorDescription: PKCE verification failed: {0}.

errors.title: Invalid authorization code
errors.errorDescription: The authorization code is invalid or has expired.

errors.title: User rate limited
errors.errorDescription: API call exceeded rate limit due to too many requests.

errors.title: Mismatched client
errors.errorDescription: The grant was issued to another client. Please make sure the 'client_id' matches the one used at the authorize request.

errors.title: Mismatched redirect URI
errors.errorDescription: The 'redirect_uri' does not match the redirection URI used in the authorization request.

errors.title: Invalid refresh token
errors.errorDescription: The refresh token is invalid or expired.

errors.title: Password auth denied MFA
errors.errorDescription: Resource owner password credentials cannot be used with MFA enabled.

errors.title: Password auth denied policy
errors.errorDescription: Resource owner password credentials authentication denied by sign on policy.

errors.title: Invalid password credentials
errors.errorDescription: The credentials provided were invalid.

errors.title: Missing password enrollment
errors.errorDescription: The user does not configure a password.

errors.title: Multiple password enrollments
errors.errorDescription: The user has multiple passwords.

errors.title: Invalid saml assertion
errors.errorDescription: 'assertion' is not a valid SAML 2.0 Assertion.

errors.title: Saml assertion auth denied MFA
errors.errorDescription: SAML Assertion credentials cannot be used with MFA enabled.

errors.title: Saml assertion auth denied policy
errors.errorDescription: SAML Assertion credentials authentication denied by sign on policy.

errors.title: Interaction code unsatisfiable
errors.errorDescription: Additional user authentication is required but the assurance requirements cannot be met with the allowed authenticators. Check the authenticator and assurance configuration for the user and client.

errors.title: Invalid interaction code
errors.errorDescription: The interaction code is invalid or has expired.

errors.title: Invalid initiate login URI
errors.errorDescription: The initiate_login_uri is invalid.

errors.title: Invalid redirect URI
errors.errorDescription: The 'redirect_uri' parameter must be a Login redirect URI in the client app settings.

errors.title: Invalid request
errors.errorDescription: Invalid request

errors.title: Multiple client credentials
errors.errorDescription: Cannot supply multiple client credentials. Use one of the following: credentials in the Authorization header, credentials in the post body, or a client_assertion in the post body.

errors.title: Client credentials in query
errors.errorDescription: Client credentials cannot be supplied via query parameters.

errors.title: Duplicated parameters
errors.errorDescription: The request contained multiple parameters with the same name.

errors.title: Illegal origin browser request
errors.errorDescription: Browser requests to the token endpoint must be part of at least one whitelisted redirect_uri.

errors.title: Not trusted origin browser request
errors.errorDescription: Browser requests to the token endpoint must be made from one of the registered Trusted Origins.

errors.title: Unknown IdP
errors.errorDescription: Identity provider is not valid.

errors.title: Illegal redirect URI
errors.errorDescription: The 'redirect_uri' parameter must be a Login redirect URI in the client app settings.

errors.title: Illegal redirect URI enhanced
errors.errorDescription: The 'redirect_uri' parameter must be a Login redirect URI in the client app settings: {0}

errors.title: Invalid client application type
errors.errorDescription: Clients with 'application_type' of 'service' are not allowed to access the '{0}' endpoint.

errors.title: Invalid state
errors.errorDescription: The authentication request has an invalid 'state' parameter.

errors.title: Invalid nonce
errors.errorDescription: The 'nonce' parameter is required for authorize requests with either the 'id_token' or 'token' response types..

errors.title: Invalid prompt
errors.errorDescription: Invalid value for 'prompt' parameter. Supported values: [{0}]

errors.title: Invalid user type
errors.errorDescription: The 'user_type' parameter must be user type name or id.

errors.title: PKCE invalid challenge
errors.errorDescription: PKCE code challenge contains illegal characters.

errors.title: PKCE missing challenge
errors.errorDescription: PKCE code challenge is required when the token endpoint authentication method is 'NONE'.

errors.title: PKCE missing verifier
errors.errorDescription: PKCE code verifier is required when the token endpoint authentication method is 'NONE'.

errors.title: PKCE unsupported code challenge method
errors.errorDescription: PKCE code challenge method is not supported. Valid values: [{0}]

errors.title: Token request missing grant type
errors.errorDescription: The token request must specify a 'grant_type'. Valid values: [{0}]

errors.title: Token request missing device ID
errors.errorDescription: Token request missing 'device_id'.

errors.errorDescription: The 'token' parameter is required.

errors.title: Invalid authorization server
errors.errorDescription: The authorization server id is invalid.

errors.errorDescription: The grant was issued for another authorization server.

errors.title: MFA attestation IdP not allowed
errors.errorDescription: 'idp' cannot be specified for MFA attestation.

errors.errorDescription: 'prompt' value cannot be specified for MFA attestation.

errors.title: MFA attestation login hint required
errors.errorDescription: 'login_hint' is required for MFA attestation.

errors.title: Invalid subject token
errors.errorDescription: 'subject_token' is invalid.

errors.title: Invalid subject token type
errors.errorDescription: 'subject_token_type' is invalid or not supported.

errors.title: PKCE challenge required
errors.errorDescription: PKCE code challenge is required to use the interaction code flow.

errors.title: Illegal post logout redirect URI
errors.errorDescription: The 'post_logout_redirect_uri' parameter must be a Logout redirect URI in the client app settings.

errors.errorDescription: The 'post_logout_redirect_uri' parameter must be a Logout redirect URI in the client app settings: {0}

errors.errorDescription: The access token is missing.

errors.title: Access token in query
errors.errorDescription: The access token cannot be presented in a query string.

errors.title: Access token duplicate
errors.errorDescription: The access token cannot be specified in both the Authorization header and the request-body.

errors.title: Authorize request object and request URI provided
errors.errorDescription: The authorize request must not contain both a request object and a request uri.

errors.title: Invalid scope
errors.errorDescription: The requested scope is invalid, unknown, malformed, or exceeds the scope granted by the resource owner.

errors.title: OpenID scope required

errors.title: No default scopes

errors.errorDescription: redirect_uri is missing.

errors.errorDescription: Can't create refresh token. The following field(s) are too long: '{0}'.

errors.errorDescription: The authorize request object is not supported by this client.

errors.title: Request URI not supported

errors.title: Invalid authorization details request scope present
errors.errorDescription: Invalid rich authorization request. The request should not include 'scope' parameter.

errors.title: Server error
errors.errorDescription: The authorization server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.

errors.title: Feature not enabled
errors.errorDescription: The requested feature is not enabled in this environment.

errors.title: ID token not created
errors.errorDescription: Failed to create the id_token.

errors.title: Access token not created
errors.errorDescription: Failed to create the access_token.

errors.title: Rar token not created

errors.title: Too many groups in groups claim
errors.errorDescription: The groups claim matched too many groups and must be configured to match fewer groups.

errors.title: User claim evaluation failure
errors.errorDescription: =The '{0}' user claim could not be evaluated.

errors.title: System claim evaluation failure
errors.errorDescription: The '{0}' system claim could not be evaluated.

errors.title: Callback returned error without description
errors.errorDescription: The callback service returned an error.

errors.title: Invalid social state
errors.errorDescription: The social identity provider returned an invalid state back to Okta.

errors.title: Get social profile error
errors.errorDescription: Could not fetch social profile.

errors.title: Invalid callout response
errors.errorDescription: The callout service returned an invalid response.

errors.title: Temporarily unavailable
errors.errorDescription: The authorization server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

errors.title: Unauthorized client
errors.errorDescription: The client is not authorized to use the provided grant type. Configured grant types: [{0}].

errors.title: Unsupported grant type browser request
errors.errorDescription: Browser requests to the token endpoint may only use the authorization_code grant_type.

errors.title: Org authorization server only client
errors.errorDescription: This client cannot use a custom authorization server.

errors.title: Unsupported grant type
errors.errorDescription: The authorization grant type is not supported by the authorization server. Configured grant types: [{0}].

errors.title: Unsupported grant type client creds org AS
errors.errorDescription: 'client_credentials' grant type can only be used with a custom authorization server.

errors.title: Unsupported response mode
errors.errorDescription: The response mode is not supported by the authorization server. Valid response modes: [query, fragment, form_post, okta_post_message].

errors.title: Unsupported response mode query with tokens
errors.errorDescription: 'query' response mode cannot be used with either the 'id_token' or 'token' response types.

errors.title: Unsupported response mode okta post message with code
errors.errorDescription: 'okta_post_message' response mode cannot be used with the 'code' response type.

errors.title: Unsupported response type
errors.errorDescription: The response type is not supported by the authorization server. Configured response types: [{0}].

errors.title: MFA attestation response type invalid
